overview: A special promo-only VHS video release that contains a 6-song Acoustic performance filmed and recorded live at The Church Studios on October 14th, 1991, as well as the 4 music videos from his first album: "Crazy", "Future Love Paradise", "The Beginning", and "Killer".  Track listing;  Deep Water (live)  Show Me (live)  Crazy (live)  Wild (live)  Whirlpool (live)  Violet (live)  Crazy  Future Love Paradise  The Beginning  Killer
title: Seal: The Video Album
